name: HappyMustardsVR
description:
Congratulations! You have surpassed the challenging journey to get here. You have now arrived at the gates of the World Condiment Olympics. The mustard bottle serves as the mustard's equipment for the Olympics. There are 3 levels. The objective is to trace the template with the mustard bottle as precise as possible to win. The mustard sauce is limited, use it wisely to earn more points. This is the final step of the experience. The VR game is only on its BETA version and will be improved in the future. It will be ideal to launch the game through WebVR for easier access. For now, It is recommended to access the game via Oculus Quest. The download link is provided below. If you do not have the recommended hardware, please watch the video walkthrough of the game. 

Special Thanks to:

Creative Director / 3D Artist - Atlanta De Guzman

Game Developer - @kirkokuev
